newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINLAND BANK JULY LIQUIDITY NEED FIM 6.03 BILLION.
newsitem.headline: FINLAND BANK JULY LIQUIDITY NEED FIM 6.03 BILLION.

text.p: The Bank of Finland said on
Monday the required daily money market liquidity balance for
the rest of the month was 6.03 billion markka.
The central bank gave the following figures (FIM mln):
Required daily balance for remaining period 6,026
